title: EYL #70 The Master Investor
itunes:title: EYL #70 The Master Investor
description:
Link To The Red Panda Academy: http://bit.ly/38n6HDm Our third stock market investing show couldn’t have come at a better time. This one is focused on futures trading, day trading/short-term trading and value investing. We spoke with long time stock market expert Ian Dunlap for insight on all of the aforementioned topics. In episode 70, Ian explained the difference between short-term trading and long-term investing and how anyone can make money in the stock market on a daily basis regardless if the market is up or down. He explained his strategy to make thousands of dollars a day trading bonds, he explained why index funds and tech stocks should be a major part of most people’s portfolio, and more. #investing #daytrading Link To The Red Panda Academy: http://bit.ly/38n6HDm Guest IG: @themasterinvestor Book Tip: Technical Analysis Explained EYL Website: https://www.earnyourleisure.com/ --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/earnyourleisure/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
